manna sums godakunds gaggida landis franiman sis þiudangardja jah gawandida sik.
LUKE 19.13 athaitands þan taihun skalkans seinans atgaf im taihun dailos jah qaþ du im:
LUKE 19.14 iþ baurgjans is fijaidedun ina jah insandidedun airu afar imma qiþandans:
ni wileima þana þiudanon ufar unsis.
LUKE 19.15 jah warþ, biþe atwandida sik aftra, andnimands þiudangardja jah haihait wopjan du sis þans skalkans þaimei atgaf þata silubr, ei gakunnaidedi ƕa ƕarjizuh gawaurhtedi.
LUKE 19.16 qam þan sa frumista qiþands:
frauja, skatts þeins gawaurhta taihun skattans.
waila, goda skalk, unte in leitilamma wast triggws, sijais waldufni habands ufar taihun baurgim.
frauja, skatts þeins gawaurhta fimf skattans.
LUKE 19.19 qaþ þan jah du þamma:
jah þu sijais ufaro fimf baurgim.
frauja, sai, sa skatts þeins þanei habaida galagidana in fanin;
LUKE 19.21 ohta mis auk þuk, unte manna hardus is.
nimis þatei ni lagides jah sneiþis þatei ni saisost.
us munþa þeinamma stoja þuk, unselja skalk jah lata.
wisseis þatei ik manna hardus im, nimands þatei ni lagida jah sneiþands þatei ni saiso;
LUKE 19.23 jah duƕe ni atlagides þata silubr mein du skattjam?
jah ik qimands miþ wokra galausidedjau þata.
LUKE 19.24 jah du þaim faurastandandam qaþ:
nimiþ af imma þana skatt jah gibiþ þamma þos taihun dailos habandin.
LUKE 19.26 qiþa allis izwis þatei ƕarjammeh habandane gibada, iþ af þamma unhabandin jah þatei habaiþ afnimada af imma.
LUKE 19.27 aþþan sweþauh fijands meinans jainans, þaiei ni wildedun mik þiudanon ufar sis, briggiþ her jah usqimiþ faura mis.
LUKE 19.28 jah qiþands þata iddja fram, usgaggands in Iairusaulwma.
LUKE 19.29 jah warþ, biþe neƕa was Beþsfagein jah Beþanijin, at fairgunja þatei haitada alewjo, insandida twans siponje seinaize LUKE 19.30 qiþands:
gaggats in þo wiþrawairþon haim, in þizaiei inngaggandans bigitats fulan asilaus gabundanana, ana þammei ni ainshun aiw manne sat;
LUKE 19.31 jah jabai ƕas inqis fraihnai: duƕe andbindiþ? swa qiþaits du imma
LUKE 19.32 galeiþandans þan þai insandidans bigetun, swaswe qaþ du im.
LUKE 19.33 andbindandam þan im þana fulan qeþun þai fraujans þis du im:
LUKE 19.35 jah attauhun þana fulan Iesua jah uswairpandans wastjos seinos ana þana fulan ussatidedun Iesu.
LUKE 19.36 gaggandin þan imma ufstrawidedun wastjom seinaim ana wiga.
LUKE 19.37 biþe þan is neƕa was, juþan at ibdaljin þis fairgunjis alewabagme, dugunnun alakjo managei siponje faginondans hazjan guþ stibnai mikilai in allaizo þoze seƕun mahte, LUKE 19.38 qiþandans:
þiuþida sa qimanda þiudans in namin fraujins;
gawairþi in himina jah wulþus in hauhistjam.
LUKE 19.39 jah sumai Fareisaie us þizai managein qeþun du imma:
LUKE 19.40 jah andhafjands qaþ du im:
qiþa izwis þatei jabai þai slawand, stainos hropjand.
LUKE 19.41 jah sunsei neƕa was, gasaiƕands þo baurg gaigrot bi þo, qiþands: LUKE 19.42 þatei
iþ wissedeis jah þu in þamma daga þeinamma þo du gawairþja þeinamma!
iþ nu gafulgin ist faura augam þeinaim, LUKE 19.43 þatei qimand dagos ana þus, jah bigraband fijands þeinai grabai þuk jah bistandand þuk jah biwaibjand þuk allaþro.
LUKE 19.44 jah airþai þuk gaïbnjand jah barna þeina in þus jah ni letand in þus stain ana staina, in þizei ni ufkunþes þata mel niuhseinais þeinaizos.
